20110105024842.000|20110105024845.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110105024845.000|20110105024847.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110105024847.000|20110105024849.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110105024849.000|20110105024849.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110105024849.000|20110105024851.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110105024851.000|20110105024851.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110105024851.000|20110105024853.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110105024853.000|20110105024853.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110105024853.000|20110105024855.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110105024855.000|20110105024857.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110105024857.000|20110105024857.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110105024857.000|20110105024859.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110105024859.000|20110105024859.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110105024859.000|20110105024901.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110105024901.000|20110105024901.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110105024901.000|20110105024904.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110105024904.000|20110105024904.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110105024904.000|20110105024907.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110105024907.000|20110105024907.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110105024907.000|20110105024908.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110105024908.000|20110105024908.000|CC1|       and some medicines,

20110105024912.000|20110105024912.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk

20110105024914.000|20110105024916.000|CC1|          genetic tests

20110105024928.000|20110105024930.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110105024930.000|20110105024930.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor

20110105024932.000|20110105024932.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor

20110105024934.000|20110105024936.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.
